natlang.rdg.documentplanner
Class MoodCreator

java.lang.Object
  natlang.rdg.documentplanner.MoodCreator
public class MoodCreator
extends java.lang.Object

The MoodCreator can be used to add sentences to the document plan which are only meant to create a mood and which do not have any important contents. The sentences are added based on the location and internal state of the agens of the plot element being currently carried out. The MoodModel can be extended with variables such as season, time and weather..
